name: Frontend Development
description: I create modern, responsive websites using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. My focus is on clean design, fast loading, and smooth user experience without relying on heavy frameworks.

name: Backend Development
description: I build custom backend systems with lightweight technologies, developing secure and reliable APIs and handling server-side logic tailored to each project.

name: WhatsApp Bot Development
description: I develop advanced WhatsApp bots with handler files, offering smart automation, custom commands, and admin tools to make communication easier and more powerful.

name: Full Stack Development
description: I deliver complete web solutions combining frontend and backend development without unnecessary complexity, focusing on stability and efficiency.

name: Cybersecurity & App Protection
description: I apply practical security practices to protect websites and bots from common threats, ensuring data privacy and safe operations.

name: Complete Project Development
description: I handle full project workflows from planning and design to development and launch, providing reliable and maintainable solutions.
